AcademicTerm.name: AcademicTerm
AcademicTerm.description: Defines an academic period which may hold other more defined time periods within it to create a specific time for reporting and offerings.

AcademicYearId.description: The academic year that's associated with the Academic Term.

Description.description: The description of the Academic Term.

EndDate.description: The date when the Academic Term ends.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the Academic Term is active (true) or not (false).

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LateRegistrationDate.description: The date from when the applications are considered as late submissions.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

RegistrationCloseDate.description: The last date for the students to register for the Academic Term.

RegistrationOpenDate.description: The date from when the students can begin to register for the Academic Term.

Season.description: Specifies the season related to the Academic Term.

StartDate.description: The date when the Academic Term starts.
